  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJIGroundStationFinishAction
    This enum will determine which kind of action the drone will take while the ground station tasks finish.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJIGroundStationIocType
    This enum reflects the type of intelligence orientation control
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJIGroundStationMovingMode
    This enum will determine the direction while the drone executes the flight.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJIGroundStationPathMode
    This enum reflects the path mode
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJINavigationFlightControlCoordinateSystem
    Flight control's coordinate system
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJINavigationFlightControlHorizontalControlMode
    Flight control horizontal control mode, will affect the Pitch/y and Roll/x.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJINavigationFlightControlVerticalControlMode
    Flight control vertical control mode, will affect the Throttle.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.DJINavigationFlightControlYawControlMode
    Flight control yaw control mode, will affect the Yaw.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationExecutionPushType
    The enum will determine the ground station execution result pushed by the drone.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFlightMode
    Ground Station Control Mode Type Define
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFollowMeMode
    This is the follow me mode used in the follow me mission.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationFollowMeYawMode
    This enum is used to set up the heading direction.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationGpsStatus
    Ground Station Gps Status Type Define
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointInterestDirection
    This enum will determine the start point of hot point mission.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointNavigationMode
    This enum will determine the yaw direction of hot point mission.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationHotPointSurroundDirection
    The enum could determine how the drone moving around the hot point, clockwise or not.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationOnWayPointAction
    This enum is used to determine which kind of action the drone will execute during the stay time in a way point.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationResult
    Ground Station Result Type Define
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationStatusPushType
    This enum will be used to classify the type of pushing information.
    DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationWayPointExecutionState
    The enum is a notification of way point execution status.
